article.title: Cubic Delivers $4 Million Radio Communications System to Canadian Forces Base Wainwright
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Cubic Defense Applications recently installed a new voice communication system at the Canadian Weapon Effects Simulation (CWES) training facility at Canadian Forces Base Wainwright, Alberta, Canada. The $4 million system was ordered by the Canadian Department of National Defence and will provide communications for many purposes, including range control, base maintenance crews, emergency response and other base operations.
